description:
After an agonizing absence, Queen Otohime returns to her people with exciting news. Unfortunately, a horrific act of violence derails the queen`s mission and changes life on Fish-Man Island forever.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Sudden Tragedy! A Gunshot Shuts Down the Future!
Totsuzen no Higeki! Mirai o Tozasu Kyoudan
Tragédie ! Le coup de feu funeste
Непредвиденная трагедия! Убийство, закрывшее дорогу в будущее!
فاجعة مفاجئة! طلقة ناريّة تغلق باب المستقبل!
突然の悲劇! 未来を閉ざす凶弾
